an5.195:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an5.195:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena pancamattani licchavisatani bhagavantam payirupasanti.
an5.195:1.3: Appekacce licchavi nila honti nilavanna nilavattha nilalankara, appekacce licchavi pita honti pitavanna pitavattha pitalankara, appekacce licchavi lohitaka honti lohitakavanna lohitakavattha lohitakalankara, appekacce licchavi odata honti odatavanna odatavattha odatalankara.
an5.195:1.4: Tyassudam bhagava atirocati vannena ceva yasasa ca.
an5.195:2.1: Atha kho pingiyani brahmano utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
an5.195:2.4: Atha kho pingiyani brahmano bhagavato sammukha saruppaya gathaya abhitthavi:
an5.195:4.1: Atha kho te licchavi pancahi uttarasangasatehi pingiyanim brahmanam acchadesum.
an5.195:4.2: Atha kho pingiyani brahmano tehi pancahi uttarasangasatehi bhagavantam acchadesi.
an5.195:5.1: Atha kho bhagava te licchavi etadavoca:
an5.195:5.4: Tathagatassa arahato sammasambuddhassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim.
an5.195:5.5: Tathagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa deseta puggalo dullabho lokasmim.
an5.195:5.6: Tathagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa vinnata puggalo dullabho lokasmim.
an5.195:5.7: Tathagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa vinnata dhammanudhammappatipanno puggalo dullabho lokasmim.
an5.195:5.9: Imesam kho, licchavi, pancannam ratananam patubhavo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
